querystring.select: SELECT vrm.DESCR AS Descr, lcpj.COMPANY_NAME AS CompanyName, vrp.PROFESSION_NAME AS ProfessionName
querystring.from: FROM dbo.LEAD_CUST lc WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.LEAD_CUST_PERSONAL lcp  WITH(NOLOCK) on lc.LEAD_CUST_ID = lcp.LEAD_CUST_ID JOIN  dbo.LEAD_CUST_PERSONAL_JOB_DATA lcpj WITH(NOLOCK) ON lcp.LEAD_CUST_PERSONAL_ID = lcpj.LEAD_CUST_PERSONAL_ID LEFT JOIN V_REF_MASTER vrm WITH(NOLOCK) ON  vrm.MASTER_CODE = lc.MR_CUST_MODEL_CODE and vrm.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'CUST_MODEL' JOIN V_REF_PROFESSION vrp WITH(NOLOCK) ON lcpj.MR_PROFESSION_CODE = vrp.PROFESSION_CODE
